data.eml:eml: Description of the mature larva of Pseudopyrochroa depressa (Pic) (Coleoptera: Pyrochroidae: Pyrochroinae), with comparison to other Taiwanese Pseudopyrochroa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Young, Daniel K., Hsiao, Yun (2016): Description of the mature larva of Pseudopyrochroa depressa (Pic) (Coleoptera: Pyrochroidae: Pyrochroinae), with comparison to other Taiwanese Pseudopyrochroa. Zootaxa 4175 (2): 189-195, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4175.2.7
